name: Cave Survival
description:
Welcome to Cave Survival use your skills of echolocation to survive as long as you can against the endless slimes.

Controls:

Left: Left Arrow Key / A

Right: Right Arrow Key / D

Up: Up Arrow Key / W

Down: Down Arrow Key / S

Fire White Sound Wave: Space

Fire Red Sound Wave: Left Shift

Credits

Art:

Pixel Art Bat Sprites - https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/pixel-art-bat-sprites/

RPG Words Cave - https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/rpg-worlds-caves/

Heart - https://xxashuraxx.itch.io/heart

Music:

Dark Music (VRC6 and 2A03) - https://opengameart.org/content/dark-music-vrc6-and-2a03
